entry.title: Handouts from Last Few Meetings
entry.summary: A couple of handouts have now been added to the Google drive. This includes the slides to Camillo’s talk on signaling games, Alena and Sophie’s slides on computational morphology, and Gary’s write-up of Gödel’s modal logic proof of the existence of God.

entry.title: Tomorrow’s Meeting is on Computational Morphology
entry.summary: Contrary to what’s claimed on the schedule, tomorrow’s meeting will be run by Alena and Sophie, who will report their first results on the computational complexity of morphology.

entry.title: April 1st Cancellation
entry.summary: Just a quick reminder: tomorrow’s reading group is cancelled so that everybody can attend the talks at LSRL 46. We will resume at our usual time on April 8.

entry.title: Schedule Change
entry.summary: Since Chong is still recuperating I will instead talk about the relation of OT and antimatroids. The paper is available in the Google drive. Note: my presentation is not related to game theory, so we’re temporarily breaking our alternating schedule.

entry.title: Aniello’s Slides
entry.summary: You can find a copy of the slides from Aniello’s presentation here.

entry.title: Topology Without Tears Link
entry.summary: In my presentation, I mentioned a PDF book called “Topology Without Tears”, which is a nice introduction to the basic topics of topology. You can find a link here

entry.title: Handout from First Meeting
entry.summary: The slides from our first meeting are now available in the Google drive. Thanks again to Alejandro for all the work he put into them.

entry.title: February 5th Cancellation
entry.summary: Hey everyone, this announcement is just to let you know that because of the weather, we’ll be cancelling our meeting today. So as not to screw up the schedule, we’ll just hold off on my presentation, and if anyone needs to cancel a non-game theory presentation I’ll jump in.
